alert.note: Alert for Concho; Mason; McCulloch; Menard; Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 10:59PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Schleicher, McCulloch, Menard, northwestern Mason and Concho Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1058 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms from Concho County south into northern Menard and northeastern Schleicher couties, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brady, Menard, Paint Rock, Eden, Melvin, Brady Lake, Lowake, Lohn, Calf Creek, Eola, Camp San Saba, Rochelle, Pear Valley, Doole, Salt Gap, Placid, Hext, Mercury, Millersview and Fort Mckavett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
